name: Sheepixel
description:
### --- SHEEPIXEL  --- ###
Made by Hamabl for LOWREZ Jam 2019

[Unzip then run Sheepixel.exe to start, Windows only]

-> The goal is simple, herd the sheep back in their pens!
-> Clicking the screens scares nearby sheep
-> Colored sheep must go to their respective pens
-> Finish before the timer ends!
-> Finishing a level early can earn you medals! (just win while the timer is yellow)
-> The game saves progress automatically

Thank you very much for playing!
Every asset was done by myself, and this is my second Game Jam participation ever.
Comments and critical thoughts will be greatly appreciated!
